column1: Table 5.28: Dominant species found in the Tropicle Montain Forest in Upper Mahaweli Watershed >1500m altitude.

column2: Calophyllum walkeri, Palaquium rubiginosum, Michelia nilagirica, Cinnamomum ovalifolium, Syzygium spp. Neotitsea fuscata, Adinandra lasiopetala, Mastixia Montana, Polyspora gardneri, Ilex walkeri, and Elaeocarpus montanus
Actinodaphne spp., Symplocos spp., Syzygium spp., Glochidion pycnocarpum, Acronychia pedunculata and Eurya spp.

Myrsine robusta, Euonymus revolutus, Arundina debilis, Maesa indica, Eurya spp, Memecylon spp, Psychotria spp, Lasianthus spp, Rhodomyrtus, Hedyotis spp.,Osbeckia spp, Microtropis zeylanica, Berberis spp. and Strobilanthes spp.
Toddalia asiatica, Elaeagnus latifolia, Piper zeylanica, Smilax zeylanica, Rubus spp.
Exacum walker, Disporum cantoniense, Arisaema leschenaultia various orchids and ferns.
